SICT-R.BK.long_name: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited
SICT-R.BK.summary: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited designs, markets, and sells microchips for RFID applications. The company engages in the design and development of linear and mixed-signal integrated circuits (ICs). Its products include high and low frequency transponder ICs, immobilizers, and high frequency reader ICs. Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SMT-R.BK.summary: Stars Microelectronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides electronics manufacturing services in Thailand and the United States. It operates through two segments, Microelectronics Module Assembly and Integrated Circuit Packaging. The company is involved in the manufacture and distribution of integrated circuit boards and radio frequency identification tags; equipment used to generate electricity from solar energy or alternative energy; and generation and distribution of electricity from solar energy or alternative energy, as well as trading business. It serves semiconductor, optical component, advanced consumer, automotive, niche and specialty, medical device, and solar industries. Stars Microelectronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.
